caption="Freda" from ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]''

column1: '''Freda''' is a character invented for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]''. She and her older brother [[Éothain (film character)
column2: Éothain]] were sent by their mother [[Morwen (film character)
column5: Wild Men]] were pillaging through [[Rohan]]. Éothain and Freda were kept safe at [[Edoras]] until Théoden led his people to [[Helm's Deep]], where they were reunited with their mother.
